title: LF chill friendly club to learn and improve in
body:
Hoping to find some chilled out fun people to play normal matches with.
I'm new and want to learn and improve but don't want to be abused - just wanna have fun! and hopefully get good enough for ranked play.

I tried playing 3 years ago and was doing ok on champs that I was learning: {{champion:1}}  (mid), {{champion:25}}  (sup) and {{champion:102}}  (jg) - I'm back on Annie atm trying to practice.
Got scared off by flamers last time :(
Lots of things have changed since I last played, still got my old builds but they no doubt need tweaking now.

Anyway add me!

replies.body: Hey mate, I'm in the same boat. Will send you a note tonight.

Same. Is it possible for me to tag along, or is it no longer available?

Currently maining top/support, have a couple mid Champs, looking to improve on jg and AD carry if anyone can give tips.

My friends say I need to focus on decision making, mainly. They say I've got the mechanics down already.
